statements: SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE rotation_number = 1;
SELECT field_id, crop_name, planting_date FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE field_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_number FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE rotation_number > 2 ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT field_id, crop_name FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE crop_name LIKE '%corn%' ORDER BY field_id ASC;
SELECT crop_name, COUNT(*) AS rotation_count FROM CropRotationSchedule GROUP BY crop_name HAVING rotation_count > 1 ORDER BY rotation_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY crop_name;
SELECT AVG(rotation_number) AS avg_rotation_number, MAX(rotation_number) AS max_rotation_number FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE planting_date < '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE field_id = 1;
SELECT field_name, soil_type FROM Field;
SELECT * FROM Field WHERE size_acres > 50;
SELECT field_name, soil_type, size_acres FROM Field ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE rotation_number BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY planting_date DESC, rotation_number ASC
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01' AND planting_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY planting_date ASC
SELECT field_name, soil_type FROM Field WHERE size_acres > 10 ORDER BY field_name DESC
SELECT crop_name, COUNT(*) AS total_rotations FROM CropRotationSchedule GROUP BY crop_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_rotations DESC
SELECT crop_name, MAX(planting_date) AS last_planting_date FROM CropRotationSchedule GROUP BY crop_name ORDER BY last_planting_date DESC
SELECT crop_id, field_id, planting_date, rotation_number FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE rotation_number = 1;
SELECT field_name, location FROM field_details WHERE soil_type = 'Clay';
SELECT * FROM crop_details WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit';
SELECT crop_id, crop_name FROM crop_details ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT field_name, location, soil_type FROM field_details WHERE location = 'Farm 1' ORDER BY field_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE rotation_number > 1 ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT crop_id, field_id FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01' AND rotation_number < 3;
SELECT field_name, location, soil_type FROM field_details WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' ORDER BY field_name;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, harvest_season FROM crop_details WHERE crop_type = 'Grains' AND harvest_season = 'Autumn';

SELECT c.crop_name, f.field_name FROM crop_details c INNER JOIN crop_rotation_schedule crs ON c.crop_id = crs.crop_id INNER JOIN field_details f ON crs.field_id = f.field_id ORDER BY f.field_name ASC, c.crop_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM field;
SELECT field_name, crop_rotation_schedule FROM field WHERE field_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT crop_name FROM crop WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, field_name FROM farmer JOIN field ON farmer.field_id = field.field_id;
SELECT planting_id, planting_date, harvest_date FROM planting_schedule WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM field WHERE field_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT field_name, crop_rotation_schedule FROM field ORDER BY field_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crop JOIN planting_schedule ON crop.crop_id = planting_schedule.crop_id ORDER BY planting_schedule.planting_date;
SELECT farmer_name, field_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM farmer JOIN planting_schedule ON farmer.field_id = planting_schedule.field_id WHERE planting_schedule.harvest_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT crop_name, COUNT(*) AS total_plantings FROM crop JOIN planting_schedule ON crop.crop_id = planting_schedule.crop_id GROUP BY crop_name ORDER BY total_plantings DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE field_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM field ORDER BY field_size DESC;
SELECT crop_name, actual_date FROM harvest_date WHERE field_id = '98765432-4321-4321-4321-210987654cba' AND actual_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, crop_variety FROM crop WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit';
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_name = 'Corn';
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM field WHERE field_size > 10;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT field_name, field_size, crop_name FROM field JOIN crop_rotation_schedule ON field.field_id = crop_rotation_schedule.field_id;
SELECT field_name, crop_name, planned_date FROM field JOIN planting_date ON field.field_id = planting_date.field_id WHERE field_name LIKE '%Field%';
